feed.title: Sparkour
feed.subtitle: An open-source collection of programming recipes for Apache Spark
feed.rights: © 2016 by Brian Uri!. Released under Apache License 2.0.

entry.title: Understanding the SparkSession in Spark 2.0
entry.summary: This recipe introduces the new SparkSession class from Spark 2.0, which provides a unified entry point for all of the various Context classes previously found in Spark 1.x.

entry.title: Installing and Configuring Apache Zeppelin
entry.summary: This recipe explains how to install Apache Zeppelin and configure it to work with Spark. Interactive notebooks such as Zeppelin make it easier for analysts (who may not be software developers) to harness the power of Spark through iterative exploration and built-in visualizations.

entry.title: Website Statistics
entry.summary: Website statistics prove that developers love Sparkour (except on the weekends). Thanks for your continued support!

entry.title: Spark Update
entry.summary: All recipes have been updated to use the new features available in Spark 2.0.0, such as the SparkSession and the new Accumulator API. I will focus exclusively on Spark 2.x in future recipes, as that is the release most in need of solid documentation.
